verses.roman:
"āmi--nīca-jāti, tumi,--atithi sarvottama
kon prakāre karimu āmi tomāra sevana?

synonyms: āmi—I; nīca-jāti—belong to a low caste; tumi—you; atithi—guest; sarva-uttama—very respectable; kon prakāre—how; karimu—shall perform; āmi—I; tomāra sevana—your service.
translation: "I belong to a low caste, and you are a very respectable guest. How shall I serve you?
